snippet.title: Arma 3 Creator DLC: Spearhead 1944 - Launch Trailer | World War II
snippet.description:
Grab your rifle and prepare to deploy to Normandy where you’ll experience World War II combat with the grand scale and intense realism that only the Arma platform can deliver. The Arma 3 Creator DLC: Spearhead 1944 is OUT NOW on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1175380/Arma_3_Creator_DLC_Spearhead_1944

"Spearhead 1944" features a new 150 km2 terrain, 5 factions, 90+ weapons/vehicles, co-op campaign for up to 24 players, SP/MP scenarios, and more.

Check out our official store ➡ https://store.bistudio.com/

About Creator DLC
Spearhead 1944 is released as an Arma 3 Creator DLC, which means it's made by a third-party developer (Heavy Ordnance Works) and published by Bohemia Interactive. To learn more about this initiative, please visit http://www.arma3.com/dlc/creator#FAQ.

About Arma 3
Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Authentic, diverse, open – Arma 3 sends you to war.

Follow us on:
Facebook ➡ http://www.facebook.com/ArmaPlatform
X (formerly Twitter) ➡ http://twitter.com/ArmaPlatform
Instagram ➡ http://instagram.com/ArmaPlatform
YouTube ➡ http://youtube.com/ArmaPlatform
TikTok ➡ https://www.tiktok.com/@armaplatform
Steam ➡ http://steamcommunity.com/app/107410

About Heavy Ordnance Works
Heavy Ordnance Works is an international team of Arma platform and World War II enthusiasts. The team has grown over the years from a small group of modders to an indie development team with many contributors from across the globe. Their goal is to deliver an immersive and intense World War II experience with a wide variety of assets on a vast landscape based on real world locations.

Website: https://spearhead-1944.com

Trailer Credits
Footage, editing, and music by Heavy Ordnance Works.

#Arma3  #DLC
